alert.note: Alert for Merced (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 9:58AM PDT until further notice by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Hanford CA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in California... Merced River at Stevinson affecting Merced County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor Flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Merced River at Stevinson. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 70.9 feet, Water is up to the maintenance building in Hagaman Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM PDT Friday the stage was 70.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 71.0 by 8am April 10th - Flood stage is 71.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 70.5 feet on 03/21/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1000 PM PDT.
